mapper.select:
SELECT t.empid, t.empname, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by emporg.depid, emporg.posid, t.entrytime) as rownum FROM [dbo].[t_empinfo] t inner join (select empid, cast( min(depid) as int) as depid, min(posid) posid from t_emporg where deletefg = '0' group by empid) emporg on t.empid = emporg.empid where t.deletefg = '0' and t.status = '0'
and t.empname like '%'+#{empname}+'%'
and t.empid in (select empid from t_emporg where orgcdid in ${item} )
and t.empid in (select empid from t_emporg where depid = #{depid})

SELECT t.roleid, t.rolename, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by t.rolename) as rownum FROM [dbo].[s_role] t where t.deletefg = '0'
and t.rolename like '%'+#{rolename}+'%'

SELECT t.empid, t.orgcdid, t1.orgname, t1.orgshortname, t.depid, dict1.busidictname as depiddict, t.posid, dict2.busidictname as posiddict from [dbo].[t_emporg] t inner join [dbo].[s_organize] t1 on t.orgcdid = t1.orgcdid and t.deletefg = t1.deletefg left join [dbo].[s_busidict] dict1 on t.depid = dict1.busidictid and dict1.busidicttypeid = 'OA_COMMON_Department' left join [dbo].[s_busidict] dict2 on t.posid = dict2.busidictid and dict2.busidicttypeid = 'OA_COMMON_Position' where t.deletefg = '0' and t.empid = #{empid}
SELECT t.empid, t.roleid, t1.rolename from [dbo].[t_emprole] t inner join [dbo].[s_role] t1 on t.roleid = t1.roleid and t.deletefg = t1.deletefg where t.deletefg = '0' and t.empid = #{empid}

SELECT convert(char(19), t.processtime, 120) as processtime, t.vacatereasontype, dict3.busidictname as vacatereasontypedict, t.otherremark, t.applystarthm, t.applyendhm, convert(char(10), t.applystart, 23) as applystart, convert(char(10), t.applyend, 23) as applyend, convert(char(19), t.applystarttime, 120) as applystarttime, convert(char(19), t.applyendtime, 120) as applyendtime, t.applyid, t.applyno, t.exclusivefg, t.applyempid, t1.empname as applyempname, t.processempid, t2.empname as processempname, t.applytype, dict1.busidictname as applytypedict, t.status, dict2.busidictname as statusdict, t.totalhours, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by t.processtime desc, t.applyno ) as rownum FROM [dbo].[t_applyform] t inner join [dbo].[t_empinfo] t1 on t.applyempid = t1.empid and t.deletefg = t1.deletefg inner join [dbo].[t_empinfo] t2 on t.processempid = t2.empid and t.deletefg = t2.deletefg left join [dbo].[s_busidict] dict1 on t.applytype = dict1.busidictid and dict1.busidicttypeid = 'OA_PC001_ApplyType' left join [dbo].[s_busidict] dict2 on t.status = dict2.busidictid and dict2.busidicttypeid = 'OA_PC002_Status' left join [dbo].[s_busidict] dict3 on t.vacatereasontype = dict3.busidictid and dict3.busidicttypeid = 'OA_PC001_VacReasonType' where t.deletefg = '0' and t.applytype = 'A1' and t.status in ( '5', '6', '7') and t.applyempid = #{empid}
and t.applyno like '%'+#{applyno}+'%'

SELECT convert(char(19), t.processtime, 120) as processtime, t.applyreason, t.applystarthm, t.applyendhm, convert(char(10), t.applystart, 23) as applystart, convert(char(10), t.applyend, 23) as applyend, convert(char(19), t.applystarttime, 120) as applystarttime, convert(char(19), t.applyendtime, 120) as applyendtime, t.applyid, t.applyno, t.exclusivefg, t.applyempid, t1.empname as applyempname, t.evectionaddress, dict3.busidictname as evectionaddressdict, t.evectionaddress1, t.evectionaddress2, t.evectionconnects, t.evectionstart, dict4.busidictname as evectionstartdict, t.airplaneflag, dict5.busidictname as airplaneflagdict, t.processempid, t2.empname as processempname, t.applytype, dict1.busidictname as applytypedict, t.status, dict2.busidictname as statusdict, t.totalhours, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by t.processtime desc, t.applyno ) as rownum FROM [dbo].[t_applyform] t inner join [dbo].[t_empinfo] t1 on t.applyempid = t1.empid and t.deletefg = t1.deletefg inner join [dbo].[t_empinfo] t2 on t.processempid = t2.empid and t.deletefg = t2.deletefg left join [dbo].[s_busidict] dict1 on t.applytype = dict1.busidictid and dict1.busidicttypeid = 'OA_PC001_ApplyType' left join [dbo].[s_busidict] dict2 on t.status = dict2.busidictid and dict2.busidicttypeid = 'OA_PC002_Status' left join [dbo].[s_busidict] dict3 on t.evectionaddress = dict3.busidictid and dict3.busidicttypeid = 'OA_PC001_EVAddress' left join [dbo].[s_busidict] dict4 on t.evectionstart = dict4.busidictid and dict4.busidicttypeid = 'OA_PC001_EVStart' left join [dbo].[s_busidict] dict5 on t.airplaneflag = dict5.busidictid and dict5.busidicttypeid = 'OA_COMMON_YesOrNo' where t.deletefg = '0' and t.applytype = 'A4' and t.status in ( '5', '6', '7') and t.applyempid = #{empid}
and t.applyno like '%'+#{applyno}+'%'
